nodes.text: The Mon Gazza Spice Mines were a spice-mining facility located on the planet of Mon Gazza. In terms of productivity, that facility was only bested by the famous mines of Kessel, where the telepathy-inducing glitterstim spice was collected. A settlement known as Miner's Town had been built around the mines to support the facility's work force. Groff Zugga, guild boss of the Mon Gazza Spice Mines, was a noted podracing promoter.
